item.title: The redbrick wall adjacent to the highway is falling down and dangerous. The whole wall needs to be replaced and the trees removed as these are affecting the current and any new structure. The bricks at the side of the road is flytipping., 16th May

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 16th May
item.description:
Customer has reported a leak coming up through the road. Water and clay are leaking up through and the road is always wet. This has been investigated by STW (10/05 - 13994350) there was no chlorine detected and advised this is a highways issue. There is a meter round section where the tarmac has worn away and may be some sublevel issues from this water.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Next to 73 or 74 Golden Vale, Churchdown, 16th May
item.description:
Small residential car park on Golden Vale estate being used to continually dismantle car, and another large van is being cut and welded into mobile kitchen. This has continued for over 4 weeks Last night noise and work continued gone 11pm
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Golden Vale, Churchdown, Tewkesbury

item.title: Increasingly expanding pothole on Elmbridge Court Roundabout, 15th May
item.description:
In lane markings between lanes 1 & 2. Difficult to avoid, due to increasing of size, when travelling from Longlevens direction over to Churchdown. It has been there for at least a couple of months, if not more, but it's growing in size. I believe it was a formally repaired pothole
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmbridge Court Roundabout, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
